suite.name: Tasks

test.name: Order robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Browser and related concepts.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about BrowserContext.
kw.msg: {"acceptDownloads": true, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "bypassCSP": false, "viewport": {"width": 1920, "height": 1080}, "deviceScaleFactor": 1.0, "isMobile": false, "hasTouch": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "hideRfBrowser": false}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://robotsparebinindustries.com/#/robot-order

kw.name: Download
kw.doc: An alias for the ``HTTP Get`` keyword.
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=rpasession_alias.httpsrobotsparebinindustries.com, url=https://robotsparebinindustries.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.doc: Pauses test execution until user clicks ``Ok`` button.

test.status: TimeoutError: page.waitForSelector: Timeout 10000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== waiting for selector "//*[@id="receipt"]" ============================================================ Note: use DEBUG=pw:api environment variable and rerun to capture Playwright logs.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

suite.doc: Orders robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc. Saves the order HTML receipt as a PDF file. Saves the screenshot of the ordered robot. Embeds the screenshot of the robot to the PDF receipt. Creates ZIP archive of the receipts and the images.
